Modo de extracción 2: Everything except input objetos
tooltip.energizedpower.chargers.txt.shif: Los cargadores pueden usarse para fabricar lingotes de cobre energizados.
Pero deberías usar un energizador en su lugar,
ya que los cargadores energizan de forma muy ineficiente.
tooltip.energizedpower.charger.item_ener: Estos objetos requieren %s para cargarse completamente.
Estos objetos requieren %s para cargarse completamente.
tooltip.energizedpower.cable.txt.shift.2: El alicate puede romper cableados más rápido.
tooltip.energizedpower.configurable_tran: El tipo de conección de la cara (%s) se fijó a %s.
tooltip.energizedpower.transformer.txt.s: Este bloque sirve para conectar diferentes niveles de cableados.
Los lados más grandes, oscuros, y con forma de diamante son las entradas.
Los lados más pequeños, brillantes, y con forma de cuadrado son las salidas.
tooltip.energizedpower.solar_panel.txt.s: La eficiencia depende del tiempo actual
tooltip.energizedpower.thermal_generator: Este fluido producirá %s hasta que se acabe
Esta máquina consume agua y produce agua sucia.
tooltip.energizedpower.advanced_pulveriz: Esta máquina consume agua y produce agua sucia.
tooltip.energizedpower.metal_press.txt.s: Los moldes se crean en la mesa de moldes de prensa.
block.energizedpower.auto_press_mold_mak: Mesa de moldes de prensa automática
item.energizedpower.auto_press_mold_make: Mesa de moldes de prensa automática
container.energizedpower.auto_press_mold: Mesa de moldes de prensa automática
Este bloque requiere filtos de carbón.
tooltip.energizedpower.block_placer.bloc: Este bloque necesita %s para ser colocado.
tooltip.energizedpower.fluid_tanks.fluid: Coloca un filtro dando click izquierdo con un objeto que contenga fluidos.
Quita el filtro dando click izquierdo sin un objeto.
tooltip.energizedpower.item_silo.txt.shi: Un silo de objetos solo se puede usar con tolvas, cintas, y otros métodos de transporte automático de objetos.
tooltip.energizedpower.drain.txt.shift: El desagüe drena los bloques fuente de fluidos que tenga encima.
tooltip.energizedpower.lightning_generat: Este bloque produce %s por cada rayo que le caiga.
Un pararrayos debe colocarse encima para que funcione
La estación de carga se usa para cargar objetos dentro del inventario del jugador.
tooltip.energizedpower.teleporter.txt.sh: Presiona [%s] estando arriba del teletransportador para teletransportarte.

advancements.energizedpower.basic_machin: This is the base crafting item for every basic machine.
advancements.energizedpower.basic_solar_: Your first solar cell of two required for your first Panel solar.
advancements.energizedpower.battery_2.de: This battery can store as much energy as 4 Nivel I batteries.
advancements.energizedpower.battery_3.de: Nivel III: Twice the power of Nivel II
advancements.energizedpower.battery_4.ti: You ask for even more Energy
advancements.energizedpower.battery_4.de: Well this is Nivel IV - only four to go

advancements.energizedpower.battery_5.de: Nivel V: You will need to energize the next battery tier...
advancements.energizedpower.battery_6.de: Nivel VI: You have energized your battery for even more storage capacity.
advancements.energizedpower.battery_7.ti: You said you need more Power?
advancements.energizedpower.battery_7.de: Nivel VII: A quarter million E of storage capacity! Can we do better?
advancements.energizedpower.battery_8.de: This is the best battery of this mod (It can store more than 1 million E)
advancements.energizedpower.battery_8_fu: You have fully charged your 1 million E battery!

advancements.energizedpower.energizedpow: This is the start of your energized power journey.
advancements.energizedpower.energizer.de: This machine can energize your copper ingots much faster and more efficient than the charger.
advancements.energizedpower.lightning_ge: Enables you to extract energy from lightning bolts.
advancements.energizedpower.energy_analy: Analyze every energy block - even if they have no GUI interface!
advancements.energizedpower.inventory_co: Produce and distribute energy in your inventory.
advancements.energizedpower.silicon.desc: Now you can power-up your factory!

Nivel III - The best of the basic Panel solars
Nivel V - Only one tier left!
Nivel VI - You have got the best Panel solar!
book.energizedpower.page.welcome.title: ¡Bienvenido/a a Energized Power!
book.energizedpower.page.welcome.1: Este mod añade muchas máquinas y objetos relacionados a la energía.
book.energizedpower.page.welcome.3: ¿Encontraste un bug o tienes una sugerencia? Coméntanos aquí
book.energizedpower.page.credits.title: Créditos
book.energizedpower.page.credits.1: Texturas de los Lingotes de cobre/oro energizados
book.energizedpower.page.chapter.resourc: Los recursos que añade el mod que serán necesarios para crear máquinas.
book.energizedpower.page.cable_insulator: El aislante de cable sirve para fabricar cableados.
Se puede conseguir dándole click derecho a un bloque de lana con tijeras, o combinándolos en el inventario.
También se puede fabricar usando un dispensador con tijeras dentro frente al bloque de lana.
book.energizedpower.page.saw_blade: La hoja de sierra se utiliza para fabricar una mesa de sierra.
book.energizedpower.page.silicon.1: El silicio es el ingrediente base del mod.
book.energizedpower.page.sawdust.1: El aserrín es un subproducto de la mesa de sierra con el que puedes fabricar bloques de aserrín.
book.energizedpower.page.sawdust.2: Los bloques de aserrín dan carbón vegetal al quemarse en un horno.
book.energizedpower.page.fertilizers: Los fertilizantes se usan para acelerar la cámara de crecimiento de plantas.
book.energizedpower.page.ore_dusts: El polvo de cada mineral se puede fundir a sus respectivos lingotes.
book.energizedpower.page.charcoal_dust: El polvo de carbón sirve para fabricar filtros de carbón.
book.energizedpower.page.charcoal_filter: Los filtros de carbón se usan para filtrar agua sucia en la planta de filtración.
book.energizedpower.page.alloys: Las aleaciones se usan en muchas recetas, se fabrican en los hornos de aleación y fundidores de inducción.
book.energizedpower.page.plates.1: Láminas, necesarias para casi toda máquina. Se pueden fabricar con un martillo o en un compresor.
book.energizedpower.page.plates.2: La aleación avanzada y láminas energizadas solo se pueden hacer con el compresor.
Productos metálicos (engranes, barras, y cables) se usan en algunas recetas.
Se fabrican desde la prensa de metal.
book.energizedpower.page.circuits: Los circuitos son necesarios para algunas recetas.
book.energizedpower.page.energized_coppe: Los lingotes de cobre energizados son necesarios para máquinas avanzadas como el energizador.
El energizador se fabrica con ese lingote, ¿verdad?
El cargador se puede usar para fabricar ese lingote.
book.energizedpower.page.energized_gold_: Los lingotes de oro energizados también se usan en máquinas avanzadas (p. ej. Estación de carga).
book.energizedpower.page.energized_cryst: El cristal matriz energizado se usa como estabilizador en algunas máquinas avanzadas.
book.energizedpower.page.chapter.upgrade: Los módulos de mejora se usan en las máquinas
book.energizedpower.page.speed_upgrades: Los módulos de velocidad aumentan la velocidad y consumo de energía.
book.energizedpower.page.energy_efficien: Los módulos de eficiencia energética reducen el consumo de energía.
book.energizedpower.page.energy_capacity: Las mejoras de capacidad energética aumentan la capacidad y velocidad de transferencia de energía.
book.energizedpower.page.duration_upgrad: Duration Upgrades increase the duration of the weather set by the Controlador de clima.
The Duration Upgrade (Nivel VI) will allow the Controlador de clima to maintain the current Weather but requires constant supply of energy.
book.energizedpower.page.range_upgrades: Range Upgrades increase the range a machine can send and receive electromagnetic waves in.
book.energizedpower.page.extraction_dept: Extracción Depth Upgrades increase the depth a machine can operate in.
book.energizedpower.page.extraction.rang: Extracción Range Upgrades increase the range a machine can operate in.
book.energizedpower.page.furnace_mode_up: Furnace Modo Upgrades change the recipes a Horno eléctrico can produce.
book.energizedpower.page.moon_light_upgr: Moon Light Upgrades allow Panel solars to produce energy during the night.
book.energizedpower.page.hammers: Los martillos se usan para fabricar láminas.
book.energizedpower.page.cutters.1: Los alicates se usan para fabricar cables.
book.energizedpower.page.cutters.2: También sirven para romper cableados más rápido.
book.energizedpower.page.wrench: La llave inglesa te servirá para configurar bloques.
book.energizedpower.page.press_mold_make: The Mesa de moldes de prensa can be used to create Press Molds for the Prensa de metal.
book.energizedpower.page.alloy_furnace.1: The Horno de aleación can be used to produce alloys.
book.energizedpower.page.alloy_furnace.2: Outputs and consumed fuels can be extracted from all sides.
book.energizedpower.page.alloy_furnace.3: Fuel can be inserted from the top and the bottom. Inputs can be inserted from all other sides (Front: All inputs slots, Left: Left input slot, Back: Middle input slot, Right: Right input slot).
book.energizedpower.page.chapter.energy_: Objetos que producen, consumen, o almacenan energía.
book.energizedpower.page.inventory_coal_: This item can produce and distribute energy in your inventory.
It can be activated by clicking en el aire.
Fuel will then automatically be taken from the inventory.
book.energizedpower.page.inventory_charg: This item distributes energy in your inventory.
book.energizedpower.page.inventory_telep: The Teletransportador de inventario can teleport players. It requires energy and a linked matriz de teletransportador to do so.
book.energizedpower.page.energy_analyzer: The Energy Analyzer can be used to get energy statics. Mainly used for energy blocks without a GUI.
It can be used by clicking on energy blocks.
The Fluid Analyzer can be used to get fluid statics.
It can be used by clicking on blocks which contain fluids.
book.energizedpower.page.batteries.2: They can be charged by the charger or with inventory generators and they can be uncharged by the uncharger.
book.energizedpower.page.chapter.energy_: Bloques que producen, necesitan, o transportan energía.
Información general sobre bloques de energía
Los marcos de máquina son la base de todas las máquinas.
Hay 4 tipos: Básico, Endurecido, Avanzado, and Reforzado avanzado
book.energizedpower.page.cables.1: Cables are used to transport energy from producer blocks to consumer blocks.
book.energizedpower.page.cables.3: A transformer is required to connect cables of different tiers.
book.energizedpower.page.transformers.1: Transformers can be used to connect different tiers of cables.
book.energizedpower.page.transformers.2: The larger, darker, diamond shaped sides are inputs.
book.energizedpower.page.transformers.3: The smaller, brighter, square shaped sides are outputs.
book.energizedpower.page.transformers.4: There are four tiers of transformers: LV, MV, HV, and EHV.
book.energizedpower.page.transformers.5: For each tier there are four types of transformers: 1 to n, 3 to 3, n to 1, and configurable.
book.energizedpower.page.transformers.6: Transformers can be used to reduce lag of cable networks by using them periodically instead of a cable block.
book.energizedpower.page.transformers.7: Transformers can also be used to connect energized power cables to other mods' cables.
book.energizedpower.page.transformers.8: Transformers can be used as battery blocks.
book.energizedpower.page.transformers.9: Transformers can be used to extract energy from AE2 energy tunnels.
book.energizedpower.page.minecart_charge: The Cargador de vagón can charge the Vagón con Caja de baterías and the Uncharger can uncharge it.
A Redstone Comparator can be used to get the current power level of a Minecart which is being charged or uncharged.
The Advanced versions have a higher transfer rate.
book.energizedpower.page.battery_box: Caja de baterías, puede almacenar energía. Todos sus bloques adyacentes pueden transferir y consumir energía.
book.energizedpower.page.solar_cells.1: Solar Cells are the base crafting item for every Panel solar.
book.energizedpower.page.solar_cells.2: There are three solar cells: Basic, Advanced, and Reinforced Advanced
book.energizedpower.page.solar_panels.1: Panel solars produce energy during the day. The efficiency depends on the time and on the weather.
book.energizedpower.page.coal_engine.1: The Motor a carbón produces energy by burning objetos.
book.energizedpower.page.coal_engine.2: Remainder objetos can be extracted automatically.
The Heat Generator produces energy if flowing or still lava touches the block.
If the Heat Generator touches still lava, it will produce more energy than if it would touch flowing lava.
The more lava blocks are touching, the more energy per tick will be produced.
If you are playing a modpack, other hot fluids might be supported too.
book.energizedpower.page.thermal_generat: The Generador térmico produces energy by consuming hot fluids.
If you are playing a modpack, other hot fluids might be supported too.
book.energizedpower.page.lightning_gener: The Generador de rayos produces high amounts of energy por cada rayo que le caiga.
book.energizedpower.page.powered_lamp: The Powered Lamp is like a Redstone Lamp but requires energy instead of an active redstone signal.
book.energizedpower.page.powered_furnace: Horno eléctricos works like the Furnace. Instead of coal they use power and they are faster than the normal furnace.
The advanced version of the Horno eléctrico has 3 input/output slot pairs.
book.energizedpower.page.auto_crafters.1: The Mesa de trabajo automática crafts objetos automatically.
book.energizedpower.page.auto_crafters.2: The recipe can be set by using the pattern slots.
book.energizedpower.page.auto_crafters.3: The Mesa de trabajo automática can handle recipe conflicts, that is recipes with the same inputs. To do this, use the "Cycle through recipes" button or set the pattern via a recipe viewer mod (like REI).
book.energizedpower.page.auto_crafters.4: The advanced version of the Mesa de trabajo automática supports multiple recipes at once.
book.energizedpower.page.crushers.1: The Trituradora can crush blocks like Stone, Sandstone, Cobblestone, and Gravel.
book.energizedpower.page.crushers.2: The advanced version of the Trituradora consumes Water and produces Dirty Water.
book.energizedpower.page.pulverizers.1: The Pulverizador produces ore dusts which can be smelted to ingots.
book.energizedpower.page.pulverizers.2: The advanced version of the Pulverizador consumes Water and produces Dirty Water.
book.energizedpower.page.sawmill.1: The Mesa de sierra can saw wood blocks and objetos.
book.energizedpower.page.sawmill.2: Sawdust will be produced which can be crafted to sawdust blocks which can be used as fuel.
book.energizedpower.page.compressor: The Compresor compresses ingots into plates.
book.energizedpower.page.metal_press.1: The Prensa de metal creates metal products (e.g. wires) from metals.
book.energizedpower.page.metal_press.2: Los moldes se pueden crear en lathe Mesa de moldes de prensa.
book.energizedpower.page.metal_press.3: Press Molds can be inserted to and extracted from the top.
book.energizedpower.page.metal_press.4: Inputs can be inserted to and outputs can be extracted from all other sides.
book.energizedpower.page.auto_press_mold: The Mesa de moldes de prensa automática is an automated version of the Mesa de moldes de prensa but requires a Shovel to craft recipes.
book.energizedpower.page.auto_stonecutte: The Cortapiedras automático is an automated version of the Stonecutter but requires a Pickaxe to craft recipes.
book.energizedpower.page.assembling_mach: The Máquina de ensamblado creates electronic components (e.g. circuits).
Outputs can be extracted from all sides.
Inputs can be inserted from all sides (Top/Bottom: All inputs slots, Front: Bottom slot, Back: Top slot, Left: Left slot, Right: Right slot).
book.energizedpower.page.plant_growth_ch: The Cámara de crecimiento de plantas can boost plant growth and yield.
The right input slot is the seed slot.
The left, optionally usable input slot is the fertilizer slot.
When the fertilizer slot is used, energy and speed multipliers are applied.
Seeds can be inserted from the north, east, south, and west. Fertilizers can be inserted from the top and bottom. Outputs can be extracted from all block faces.
If you'd like to use a fertilizer, the fertilizer must be inserted first.
If you'd like to automate this blocks, you need to keep in mind that yields are randomized.
book.energizedpower.page.stone_liquefier: The Licuefactor de piedra produces Lava from Stone blocks.
Fluids must be extracted with a pipe.
book.energizedpower.page.stone_solidifie: The Solidificador de piedra produces Stone blocks from Water and Lava.
Fluids must be inserted with a pipe.
book.energizedpower.page.filtration_plan: The Planta de filtración can filter raw ores from Dirty Water.
Charcoal Filters can be inserted from every block face. Outputs can be extracted from block face.
book.energizedpower.page.fluid_transpose: The Transportador de fluidos can extract fluids from objetos (Modo: Vaceando) and can inject fluids into objetos (Modo: Llenando).
book.energizedpower.page.induction_smelt: The Fundidor de inducción can be used to produce alloys.
Outputs can be extracted from all sides.
Inputs can be inserted from all sides (Front/Top/Bottom: All inputs slots, Left: Left input slot, Back: Middle input slot, Right: Right input slot).
book.energizedpower.page.block_placer.1: The Colocador de bloques can place all blocks (Even doors and seeds).
book.energizedpower.page.block_placer.2: Blocks will only be placed if possible.
book.energizedpower.page.fluid_filler_fl: The Llenador de fluidos can fill fluids into objetos and the Drenaje de fluidos can drain fluids from objetos.
book.energizedpower.page.fluid_pumps: The Bomba de fluidos can pump fluids from the world and requires Cobblestone to do so.
book.energizedpower.page.charger_uncharg: The Cargador can charge objetos and the Uncharger can uncharge objetos.
The advanced version of the Cargador and the Uncharger have 3 slots.
book.energizedpower.page.charging_statio: The Estación de carga can charge objetos wirelessly.
book.energizedpower.page.crystal_growth_: The Cámara de crecimiento de cristales can be used to grow crystals like amethysts.
book.energizedpower.page.energizer: The Energizador can energize objetos very efficiently.
book.energizedpower.page.weather_control: The Controlador de clima can change the weather temporarily. It requires energy to do so.
book.energizedpower.page.time_controller: The Controlador de tiempo can change the time of the day. It requires energy to do so.
It can not go back in time, the time value will always be incremented.
book.energizedpower.page.teleporter_matr: Teleporter Matrices are used for linking Teleporters.
The settings of a matriz de teletransportador can be copied by putting a linkend and one or more unlinked Teleporter Matricies into a Crafting Table.
book.energizedpower.page.teleporter.1: The Teleporter can teleport players. It requires energy and a linked matriz de teletransportador to do so.
book.energizedpower.page.teleporter.2: It outputs a redstone signal if the Teleporter is ready for teleportation.
book.energizedpower.page.teleporter.3.1: The Teleporter can be triggered manually by pressing
book.energizedpower.page.chapter.fluid_b: Blocks that can store and transfer fluids.
book.energizedpower.page.fluid_pipes.2: The mode of every pipe side can be configured with a Wrench.
book.energizedpower.page.fluid_pipes.3: A single fluid pipe block can only extract one fluid type at once even when multiple sides are configured as Extracción.
book.energizedpower.page.fluid_pipes.4: There are two tiers of fluid pipes: Iron and Golden.
book.energizedpower.page.fluid_tanks.1: Tanque de fluidoss can store fluids.
book.energizedpower.page.fluid_tanks.2: There are three tiers of Tanque de fluidoss: Pequeño, Mediano, and Grande.
book.energizedpower.page.drain.1: The Desagüe drains fluid source blocks above the block.
book.energizedpower.page.drain.2: On the Fabric version the Desagüe can extract fluids from Cauldrons.
book.energizedpower.page.item_conveyor_b: Item Conveyor belts can transport objetos.
The slope of conveyor belts can be configured with a Wrench.
Conveyor belts can be loaded with hoppers and any block which can insert objetos into blocks.
Conveyor belts can insert objetos into blocks in front of the conveyor belt.
Alternatively they can be unloaded with hoppers and other blocks which can extract objetos from blocks.
Conveyor belts are compatible with the AE2 item tunnel.
The Item Conveyor Belt Loader can extract objetos from any storage blocks (even other conveyor belts) and load them onto a conveyor belt.
The larger square must face the block where objetos are extracted from and the smaller square must face a conveyor belt.
Alternatively objetos can be extracted from the loader with hoppers and other blocks which can extract objetos from blocks.
It can be stacked vertically and horizontally.
It can be disabled with a redstone signal.
The Item Conveyor Belt Sorter takes objetos from an input conveyor belt and routes them to certain output conveyor belt.
The input conveyor belt must face the large square and must not be ascending.
There are no restrictions for the output conveyor belts.

The outputs are color coded (red: first output and always on the left side relative to the input, yellow: second output and on the opposite side relative to the input, green: third output and on the right side relative to the input).
The item will be routed to the first output where the filter matched (Priority: OUT 1, OUT 2, OUT 3).
The filter matches if at least one pattern item of the output filter row matches the input item.
Pattern objetos can be placed by taking the item from the inventory and left-clicking a pattern slot. The filter can be reset by left-clicking without an item.
To allow any objetos select blacklist without any pattern objetos. If an output is desconectada the filter should be set to whitelist without any pattern objetos.
A redstone signal of strength 15 will be emitted if no filter matches (If no output is connected or if it is full no redstone signal will be emitted).

The Item Conveyor Belt Interruptor de takes objetos from the input conveyor belt (Must face the large square and must not be ascending) and puts them onto the output conveyor belt on the side with the green indicator.
As long as a redstone signal is applied, the other output will be selected.
The Item Conveyor Belt Splitter takes objetos from the input conveyor belt (Must face the large square and must not be ascending) and puts them evenly on the connected output conveyor belts.
The Item Conveyor Belt Mezclador de takes objetos evenly from the connected input conveyor belts (They must face a large square and must not be ascending) and puts them on the output conveyor belt.
book.energizedpower.page.item_silos.1: Silo de objetoss can only hold a single item type but can hold up to 1000 stacks of the item.
book.energizedpower.page.item_silos.2: Silo de objetoss can only be loaded and unloaded with hoppers, belts, and other means of automatic item transport.
book.energizedpower.page.item_silos.3: There are five tiers of Silo de objetoss: Tiny, Pequeño, Mediano, Grande, and Gigante
book.energizedpower.page.dirty_water.1: Dirty Water is produced as a by-product in some machines which consume Water.
book.energizedpower.page.dirty_water.2: Dirty Water can be cleaned in the Planta de filtración.
book.energizedpower.page.upgrade_configu: Most machines support Upgrade Modules. Upgrades can not be inserted automatically.
book.energizedpower.page.redstone_mode_c: Ignore: The machine is always active
High: The machine is only active if a redstone signal of strength 1 or higher is present
Low: The machine is only active if no redstone signal is present
book.energizedpower.page.comparator_mode: Item: The comparator output is calculated based on how full the inventory of the machine is
Fluid: The comparator output is calculated based on how full the tank(s) of the machine is/are
Energy: The comparator output is calculated based on how much energy is stored in the machine
book.energizedpower.page.battery_box_min: Los vagones con caja de baterías pueden transportar energía por vías. Se pueden cargar con cargadores de vagones y se descargan con descargadores de vagones.
book.energizedpower.page.chapter.structu: Estructuras que se encuentran por el mundo.
book.energizedpower.page.electrician.1: El aldeano electricista se puede encontrar en su propia casa.
book.energizedpower.page.electrician.2: La casa del electricista se encuentra en todas las aldeas vanilla.
book.energizedpower.page.electrician.3: El marco de máquina básica se puede usar para obtener un aldeano electricista.
book.energizedpower.page.factory.title: Edificio de fábrica
book.energizedpower.page.factory.1: Contiene un par de máquinas y algo interesante en el centro. Se puede encontrar en los biomas de bosque y bosque floral.
book.energizedpower.page.small_solar_far: Es una estructura con paneles solares produciendo energía. Se puede encontrar en biomas como el Desierto, Mesa, y sabana.
